page.title: 12Traffic_A Local Concern.
page.content: There was great concern recently in the village over a proposal to make the road passing through Cheriton a Designated Heavy Lorry Route.There was a great deal of opposition because the road is so narrow and there are dangerous bends without any footpath. Many children walk to school that way and it was felt it would be very dangerous,also that damage and pollution would be caused to a beautiful village. The proposal was defeated,but we thought it would be interesting to see what sort of traffic was passing through the village now.All of our class took part in a traffic survey of north and southbound traffic.The results are on the next two pages.
